content: we will crochet these shawls together for 5 weeks in this fb group https //www facebook com/groups/2760769384151530/ we start june 1st 2020 it will be a bit different cal because you will get every week 1 part of pattern not only for 1 but 2 different shawls its up to you if you choose grace or her younger sister giulietta or you can crochet both you can find more info in that fb group
